metadata.title: CVE-2024-28564 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in open source FreeImage v.3.19.0 [r1909]allows a local attacker to cause a denial of service (DoS) via theImf_2_2::CharPtrIO::readChars() function when reading images in EXR format.

criterions.comment: freeimage package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
